long_description: The Kuhl Java Full-Zip Hoodie brings some boho chic to your outdoor wardrobe, but don't be fooled by its casual vibe: It's made with some serious performance fabrics that put it ahead of the rest. Transformed recycled coffee grounds used in the innovative Coffeenna(TM) fabric prevent odor-causing bacterial growth, keeping you fresh even after multiple wears. Coffeenna fabric also enhances breathability, dries quickly and wicks moisture away from the skin so you stay comfortable even in warm temperatures. Tunic-style length, built-in UPF 50+ plus long sleeves and a hood add up to total sun protection, while lightweight fabrics help you stay cool. Kuhl Java Full-Zip Hoodie features a full-length zipper for immediate ventilation and easy on/off.
short_description: The Kuhl Java Full-Zip Hoodie brings some boho chic to your outdoor wardrobe, but don't be fooled by its casual vibe: It's made with some serious performance fabrics that put it ahead of the rest.
